About Us

Our Story is Unbending, Yet Agile

Some words about the company

Altanine is a global biopharmaceutical company changing patients’ lives in over 120 countries by finding new and affordable ways to treat diabetes and other illnesses.

Worldwide, more than half a billion people have diabetes.

In the U.S., it’s more than 37 million — and 9 out of 10 have type 2 diabetes, a complex disease where the body doesn’t use energy from food properly.

Despite the many treatment advancements in recent years, only half of the people living with diabetes are meeting goals for lowering their blood glucose levels.

When glucose is not properly managed, it may lead to serious complications, including kidney disease, nerve damage, heart attack and stroke.


Diabetes is accelerating at an alarming rate globally. Today, over 475 million people across all age groups and social classes, live with the chronic condition. What is even more worrying is the fact that this mostly goes undetected until it reaches life-threatening proportions. The needs of people with type 2 diabetes continue to evolve over time, and treatment approaches need to reflect that.

Our innovative products repurpose a traditional and effective diabetes therapy allowing patients to increase compliance without suffering side effects or related difficulties with swallowing large pills.

Our Mission

The elements that form our company.

01

Innovate Drug Delivery:

Our mission is to revolutionize the pharmaceutical market by developing advanced delivery mechanisms for Metformin, aimed at enhancing efficacy and minimizing side effects for diabetes patients.

02

Enhance Patient Experience:

We are committed to simplifying medication routines for our customers by offering products that are easier to administer, aiming to improve adherence and outcomes in diabetes management.

03

Global Accessibility:

Our goal is to distribute our innovative drugs worldwide, ensuring that patients across the globe have access to safer, more effective, and efficient diabetes treatment options.

values

Our core values.

Innovation:

We prioritize research and development to create products that offer unique benefits, such as reduced side effects and improved ease of use, setting us apart from generic Metformin manufacturers.

Safety and Efficacy:

Our commitment to producing drugs that are both safe and highly effective is at the core of everything we do. We strive to exceed the industry standards and ensure our customers receive the best possible treatment options.

Customer-Centricity:

Understanding the needs and challenges of our customers is fundamental. We aim to build trust and confidence among our customers by providing them with superior drug options that improve their quality of life, making us their preferred choice for diabetes treatment.

Leadership Team
